H0.text: Sulfonate is the ionic end of a detergent that can either be a sulfate or sulfonate.

H1.text: Molecule is the ionic end of a detergent that can either be a sulfate or a molecule.

H2.text: Calcite is the other ionic end of a detergent besides sulfate.

H3.text: Phosphate is the ionic end that a detergent can have besides sulfate.

A4.text: Sodium laureth sulfate, or SLES, a common detergent in shampoo formulations.
